The '''void start platform''' is a [[feature]] of 33×33 square of [[stone]] with a single block of [[cobblestone]] in the center. One can generate at the origin of [[superflat]] worlds with "The Void" preset and [[single biome]] worlds if in [[The Void|{{code|the_void}} biome]].{{Only|je}}

== Generation ==
The void start platform spawns from [[Coordinates#Block position|block positions]] (-8, -61{{Only|je|short=1}}/-64{{Only|be|short=1}}, -8) to (24, -61{{Only|je|short=1}}/-64{{Only|be|short=1}}, 24), and thus the [[player]] spawns at Y=-60{{Only|je|short=1}}/Y=-63{{Only|be|short=1}}. This feature is most easily accessible through "The Void" [[presets|preset]] but it still generates if different layers are specified, even if it gets engulfed. Void start platforms replace any blocks such as even [[bedrock]] when generated underground.

== Construction ==
{{main|Void Start Platform/Structure}}
Void start platforms are large platforms made up of [[stone]] and [[cobblestone]].
